com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.oath.soft

Interface SoftDcvOathSettings


  • public interface SoftDcvOathSettings
    Gemalto DCV OATH settings interface
    Since:
    4.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDcvHashAlgorithm(SoftOathSettings.OathHashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm)
      Set the DCV hash algorithm.
      void setDcvLength(int dcvLength)
      Set the DCV length.
      void setDcvStartTime(long startTime)
      Set the T0 value for DCV computation.
      void setDcvTimeSetting(int dcvTimestepSize, SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType dcvTimestepType)
      Set the DCV time step size.

    • Method Detail

      • setDcvLength

        void setDcvLength(int dcvLength)
        Set the DCV length.
        Parameters:
        dcvLength - the DCV length. Allowed range is 3-4 digits.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when DCV Length is not in allowed range.
        Since:
        4.1

      • setDcvHashAlgorithm

        void setDcvHashAlgorithm(SoftOathSettings.OathHashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm)
        Set the DCV hash algorithm. Default value is SHA1
        Parameters:
        hashAlgorithm - the hmac algorithm.
        Since:
        4.1

      • setDcvStartTime

        void setDcvStartTime(long startTime)
        Set the T0 value for DCV computation.
        Parameters:
        startTime - value to start counting time steps. Default value is 0.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when startTime is negative.
        Since:
        4.1

      • setDcvTimeSetting

        void setDcvTimeSetting(int dcvTimestepSize,
                       SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType dcvTimestepType)
        Set the DCV time step size.
        Parameters:
        dcvTimestepSize - the time step size. Default value is 20
        dcvTimestepType - the time step Type. Default value is minutes
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when timestepSize is less than or equal to 0.
        Since:
        4.1
